prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Brass, Piano, Bass, Organ, Drums, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features the sounds of Guitar, Brass, Piano, Bass, Organ, and Drums, but without Pipe.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Brass, Piano, Bass, Organ, and Drums, but Pipe is absent.

Style 3:
This piece is played with Guitar, Brass, Piano, Bass, Organ, and Drums, Pipe excluded.
